subject: Hockey, Ice
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Dementia
Brain
Sports Injuries
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: Gary Bettman, the N.H.L. commissioner, defended the physical nature of professional hockey and cautioned against connecting any dots between the brain disease C.T.E. and fighting.
snippet: Gary Bettman, the N.H.L. commissioner, defended the physical nature of professional hockey and cautioned against connecting any dots between the brain disease C.T.E. and fighting.
